about_the_game:
GAMEPLAY & FEATURES


  • Single-ending VN with 30 minutes till credits

STORY


In the peaceful city of Kawado Higashi, an ordinary girl named Haruna walks along the road as usual. The frequent number of accidents in the area, though serious, hadn't worried Haruna too much. However, when she hears her classmates talking about an attack on the street, Haruna begins to fear that she may soon become involved herself...

CHARACTER



Haruno Aikawa
(Voice: Saya Kazuki)

The main heroine of "Concerto 1".
A diligent honor student with a bright and strong-willed personality.
Always positive and cheerful, she gets along well with most everyone.
But due to her strong sense of duty, she finds it hard to rely on others.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains occasional crude humor. All love interests are 18 years of age or older.

name: Holy Valkyrie EXS-TiA: Concerto 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound

short_description: From hit Japanese VN developer Lusterise! In an ordinarily peaceful town plagued by disasters, the heroine Haruna becomes involved for reasons seemingly unknown. But in reality, she is a transforming messenger of justice on a mission to eliminate the root cause of the crisis.
